entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: WSW 37 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
